ISSUE.TITLE: Number and date calculation fail to render in UI
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Using numeric operators and functions lead to no visual output in UI with flowing error in console: ``` TypeError: e.replace is not a function NuxtJS 91 handleTZ result ``` Functions, however, return expected results in REST API calls. Bug appeared in v0.90.7. <details> <summary>.gif illustration</summary> ![Peek 2022-04-25 16-34](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/61871501/165118302-390eb6ef-e883-4d8e-8eca-383d5b87f7b8.gif) </details> Node: **v12.22.12** Arch: **x64** Platform: **linux** Docker: **true** Database: **pg** ProjectOnRootDB: **true** RootDB: **pg** PackageVersion: **0.90.7**

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #1867 from nocodb/feat/create-project-improvements feat: show schema name option for mssql and pg project creation

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: ignore date formatting if type is not string re #1864 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>
